Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2018 06:05PM Nadiap wrote: Hi everyone, I was diagnosed as 3C in Aril 2017 at 34. Like @Lianakalb says it gives so much hope to read such stories. Being so young and listening to oncologists saying you have 50% or less to make it to 10 years, is really tough to get your head around and figure out how to keep going on as a normal young person.
Posts.Title: Stage III Cancer Survivors...15+ years and out weesa lexi4
